code_quality.reason: Poor quality: 1) No error handling anywhere, 2) Hardcoded HTML generation is messy, 3) Indentation errors in DashboardHandler, 4) No input validation, 5) File operations without exception handling, 6) Mixed concerns (data generation, parsing, and HTML generation in main), 7) No docstrings or comments explaining logic

elegance.reason: Inelegant implementation: Writing static HTML file instead of serving dynamic content, no separation of concerns, repetitive code, no data API endpoint for JavaScript to consume, crude string concatenation for HTML generation
